text: [Music]
I think journalists
um if there's one thing that we should
be doing, it's to uh surprise people a
little bit.
I think so often uh we have ideas about
the world that are uh seem fully formed
and too often the media uh such as it is
um just reinforces those things. um
partly out of habit and partly out of
laziness. I think um I think the the
role of the person that the the the
farthest feeler out there which is the
journalist in the field is to challenge
assumptions and to to um provoke
questions um about those those
assumptions that um Iraqis are like this
or Afghanis are like this or we're uh
engaged in such and such a conflict for
this or that reason and to try to um to
break through some of Fantastic.
